md_weekly_mission_types_tips_1:
Cook for Snorlax and feed it Berries
to raise it to the target rating!
md_weekly_mission_types_tips_2:
You can cook up to three times per day.
You’ll have chances to make something
at breakfast (starting at 6 AM),
lunch (starting at noon), and
dinner (starting at 6 PM).
md_weekly_mission_types_tips_5:
Gather more Berries by adding Pokémon
that are good at finding Berries to your
current research team!
md_weekly_mission_types_tips_6:
Gather the Berries this week’s Snorlax
likes best by adding Pokémon that are
good at finding those particular Berries
to your current research team!
md_weekly_mission_types_tips_7:
Start tracking your sleep within
30 minutes of the bedtime you
decide on with your Pokémon.
md_weekly_mission_types_tips_8:
You can befriend Pokémon by giving
them Poké Biscuits during snack time
and maxing out their friendship points!
md_weekly_mission_types_tips_9:
Give Poké Biscuits and other treats to
Pokémon during snack time. Each day,
you can get one Bonus Biscuit.
md_weekly_mission_types_tips_10:
You can get candies for Pokémon by
conducting sleep research, among other
ways. Use them to raise your Pokémon!
